definitions.text: act between parties with a view to reconciling differences
examples: He interceded in the family dispute

definitions.text: occupy an intermediate or middle position or form a connecting link or stage between two others
examples: mediate between the old and the new

definitions.text: acting through or dependent on an intervening agency
examples: the disease spread by mediate as well as direct contact

definitions.text: being neither at the beginning nor at the end in a series
examples: adolescence is an awkward in-between age
the middle point on a line
